item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Making AR experiences is still painful – had to make my own editor (73 points | 14 comments)
2. Facebook Ban on Linux (29 points | 5 comments)
3. Sweden Seizes Ship Suspected of Baltic Sea 'Sabotage' (58 points | 20 comments)

6. Hackers get $886,250 for 49 zero-days at Pwn2Own Automotive 2025 (55 points | 29 comments)

9. Two Programming-with-AI Approaches (22 points | 2 comments)

22. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (157 points | 80 comments)
23. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (169 points | 41 comments)

25. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (384 points | 39 comments)
26. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (218 points | 105 comments)
27. Hyperbound (YC S23) is hiring a Founding Account Executive in SF ( | hide)

29. Wikenigma – An Encyclopedia of Unknowns (49 points | 3 comments)
